TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WsdlImporter extends System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter

summary.span: 与 WS-Policy 附件一起导入 Web Services 描述语言 (WSDL) 1.1 元数据。

span.span: Imports Web Services Description Language (WSDL) 1.1 metadata with WS-Policy attachments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类可导入元数据并将这些信息转换为表示协定和终结点信息的不同类。Use the class to import metadata as well as convert that information into various classes that represent contract and endpoint information. 的基类（ 类）定义一些方法，这些方法有选择地导入协定和终结点信息以及公开任何导入错误的属性，并接受与导入和转换过程相关的类型信息。The base class for , the class, defines methods that selectively import contract and endpoint information and properties that expose any import errors and accept type information relevant to the import and conversion process. 类型使用其父类型中的自定义策略导入程序（ 实现）来处理自定义策略语句，并使用它自己的自定义 WSDL 导入程序（ 实现）来处理自定义 WSDL 元素。The type uses the custom policy importers ( implementations) from its parent type to handle custom policy statements and its own custom WSDL importers ( implementations) to handle custom WSDL elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [扩展元数据系统](/dotnet/framework/wcf/extending/extending-the-metadata-system)。For details, see [Extending the Metadata System](/dotnet/framework/wcf/extending/extending-the-metadata-system). 当从 WSDL 文档导入策略时， 类型将尝试附加到不同 WSDL 策略主题的最多 32 个备用策略组合。When importing policy from WSDL documents, the type will try up to 32 combinations of policy alternatives attached to the different WSDL policy subjects. 如果没有完全导入任何组合，则使用第一个组合来构造部分自定义绑定。If no combination imports cleanly, the first combination is used to construct a partial custom binding. 除了这些方法和属性外， 还实现支持导入绑定信息和属性的方法，这些绑定信息和属性提供对任何策略文档、WSDL 文档、WSDL 扩展及 XML 架构文档的访问。In addition to these methods and properties, also implements methods that support importing binding information and properties that provide access to any policy documents, WSDL documents, WSDL extensions, and XML schema documents. 有关扩展 以支持自定义 WSDL 元素的信息，请参见 。For information about extending to support custom WSDL elements, see . 通常，分三步使用 类。Typically the class is used in a three-step process. 1. 创建一个 对象，并将 对象传递给构造函数。Create a object and pass a object to the constructor. 2. 调用适当的 `Import` 方法来检索结果。Call the appropriate `Import` method to retrieve the results. 3. 检查 属性，以确定是否有任何导入错误。Check the property to determine whether there are any import errors. > [!NOTE] > 当导入 WSDL 端口类型时，如果端口类型的 QName 与 词典中的某个条目匹配，则不导入该端口类型，而是改用已知协定。When importing WSDL port types, if the QName of the port type matches an entry in the dictionary then the port type is not imported and the known contract is used instead. 在调用其中一个导入方法之前，不会从 属性中返回值。No values are returned from the properties until one of the import methods is called. 可以 通过编程方式或使用客户端配置[ < wsdlImporters > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/wsdlimporters)元素将自定义对象加载到中。Custom objects can either be loaded into the programmatically or using the client configuration [<wsdlImporters>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/wsdlimporters) element. 已作为服务终结点导入的元数据无法用于创建运行时或导出元数据，因为导入的终结点不包含托管类型信息。Metadata that has been imported as service endpoints cannot be used to create a runtime or export metadata because the imported endpoints contain no managed type information. 若要使用元数据创建客户端或服务运行时，或者若要生成元数据，您必须先从元数据中生成和编译代码，然后使用该类型信息创建使用 的新 对象。To use the metadata to create a client or service runtime or to generate metadata, you must first generate and compile code from the metadata and use that type information to create a new object using . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 来添加自定义 ，导入所有协定，编译这些协定并将其保存到文件中。The following code example shows how to use the to add a custom , import all contracts, and compile those contracts and save them to a file. [!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/client.cs#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 构造函数可从一组元数据文档中创建一个 对象。Use the constructor to create a object from a set of metadata documents. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示将 类与 类结合使用的最常见用法。The following code example shows the most common use of class with the class. [!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/client.cs#10)]

summary.span: 从指定的元数据、自定义策略导入程序和自定义 WSDL 导入程序创建一个 对象。

span.span: Creates a object from the specified metadata, custom policy importers, and custom WSDL importers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数可控制要导入的元数据以及要使用的策略和 WSDL 导入程序。Use this constructor to control the metadata to be imported and the policy and WSDL importers to be used. > [!NOTE] > 如果将自定义策略导入程序或自定义 WSDL 导入程序传递给此构造函数，则不加载在应用程序配置文件中指定的任何自定义导入程序。If custom policy importers or custom WSDL importers are passed to this constructor any custom importers specified in application configuration files are not loaded. 如果您要添加某个自定义导入程序，则必须在使用此构造函数之前重新构建导入程序集合。If you want to add a custom importer, you must reconstruct the importers collections prior to using this constructor. 请参见“示例”一节。See the Example section. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在使用 `WSDLDocumentationImporter` 对象之前将新的自定义 WSDL 导入程序 () 添加到默认的导入程序组中。The following code example shows how to add a new custom WSDL importer (the `WSDLDocumentationImporter`) to the default set of importers prior to using the object. [!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/client.cs#11)]

span.span: The argument is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可从元数据文档导入所有绑定信息，并将它们作为 对象返回。Use the method to import all binding information from the metadata documents and return them as objects. 在使用返回的对象之前，请检查 属性以确定是否有任何导入错误。Check the property to determine whether there are any import errors before using the returned objects. 若要导入特定 WSDL 绑定，请参见 方法。To import a specific WSDL binding, see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可从元数据文档导入所有 WSDL 端口类型信息，并将它们作为 对象返回。Use the method to import all WSDL port type information from the metadata documents and return them as objects. 建议您在使用返回的对象之前检查 属性，以确定是否有任何导入错误。It is recommended to check the property to determine whether there are any import errors before using the returned objects. 若仅导入一个端口类型，请参见 方法。To import only one port type, see the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 来添加自定义 ，导入所有协定，编译这些协定并将其保存到文件中。The following code example shows how to use the to add a custom , import all contracts, and compile those contracts and save them to a file. [!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/client.cs#8)]
